urgent.action: Chinese about page has 204 impressions at position #1 but ZERO clicks. Improve meta title and description in Chinese to be more compelling. Add clear CTA and ensure the page renders properly for Chinese users.
urgent.reasoning: Position #1 with 204 impressions and 0 clicks indicates a severe meta tag or snippet issue. This is your highest-impression page being completely wasted.

urgent.action: HTTP version of /en has 99 impressions at position #12. Ensure proper 301 redirect from http:// to https:// and set canonical tags. Submit URL removal for http version in GSC.
urgent.reasoning: Duplicate indexing splits ranking signals between http and https versions. 99 impressions are being wasted on a non-canonical URL.

quickWins.action: Optimize meta title/description for 'donuts near me' — currently position #9.2 with 18 impressions but 0 clicks. Add location (Waikiki), opening date, and unique value prop to snippet.
quickWins.reasoning: High-intent local search query with decent impressions. Better meta tags could capture 2-3 clicks/week.

quickWins.action: Position #8 with 24 impressions and 0 clicks. Enhance meta description to differentiate from generic Kona coffee results — emphasize cafe experience, Waikiki location, fresh donuts.
quickWins.reasoning: Branded-adjacent query with strong volume. Currently lost in generic coffee results.

quickWins.action: Position #12 with 6 impressions. Create dedicated 'Best Donut Shop in Waikiki' content section. Add structured data for local business.
quickWins.reasoning: Moving from page 2 to page 1 could significantly increase impressions and clicks.

opportunities.action: Create dedicated landing pages for 'coffee near me' (pos #28) and 'dessert near me' (pos #26). These high-intent local queries need location-optimized content with Google Maps embed, hours, and menu highlights.
opportunities.reasoning: Local 'near me' queries are extremely high-intent. Currently ranking on page 3 — dedicated local SEO content could push to page 1.

opportunities.action: Japanese market showing 26 impressions and 1 click. Korean market: 25 impressions, 1 click. Optimize hreflang tags, create targeted content for Japanese tourists visiting Waikiki.
opportunities.reasoning: Waikiki is a top destination for Japanese and Korean tourists. Multi-language SEO has strong growth potential.

opportunities.action: Create a dedicated grand opening page (Feb 25, 2026) with event schema markup, special offers, and social proof. Target 'new coffee shop waikiki' and 'waikiki grand opening' keywords.
opportunities.reasoning: Grand opening is 11 days away. Time-sensitive content with event markup can capture search interest.

insights.observation: Desktop dominates at 68% of impressions vs 30% mobile. Unusual for a local food business where mobile typically leads.
insights.suggestion: Investigate if mobile pages are being suppressed. Check mobile usability in GSC. Optimize for mobile-first indexing.

insights.observation: 'kona coffee donut' is the #1 keyword with 33% CTR at position #1, accounting for 28% of all clicks. Strong brand recognition building.
insights.suggestion: Continue building brand awareness. The branded query performance is excellent — focus on expanding non-branded visibility.

insights.observation: Korean page /ko/about-kona-coffee ranks #2.2 with 31 impressions. Korean keyword '코나 커피 특징' at position #4.8. Korean content is performing well.
insights.suggestion: Expand Korean content — add Korean menu page, blog posts about Kona coffee culture for Korean audience.
